016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view;
017
018import java.util.ResourceBundle;
019
020/**
021 * Utility class declaring constants read from (and for reading from) {@link ResourceBundle}
022 * strings, suitable for use in console-mode output.
023 */
024public class Presentation {
025
026  /** Base name of {@link java.util.ResourceBundle} containing user-facing strings. */
027  public static final String BASE_BUNDLE_NAME = "strings";
028  /** {@link ResourceBundle} with the base name specified by {@link #BASE_BUNDLE_NAME}. */
029  public static final ResourceBundle STRINGS_BUNDLE = ResourceBundle.getBundle(BASE_BUNDLE_NAME);
030
031  /** Property key of a format string usable for displaying day # and numeric solution value. */
032  public static final String NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT_KEY = "numeric_solution_format";
033
034  /** Value of the {@link #NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT_KEY} property of {@link #STRINGS_BUNDLE}. */
035  public static final String NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT =
036      STRINGS_BUNDLE.getString(NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT_KEY);
037
038}
